UniProt Entry.description: The amino acid sequence of the current peptide coincides with the amino acid sequence of the UniProt entry.

Literature.Title: A Designed Analog of an Antimicrobial Peptide, Crabrolin, Exhibits Enhanced Anti-Proliferative and In Vivo Antimicrobial Activity.
Literature.Author: Yao A, Ma Y, Sun R, Zou W, Chen X, Zhou M, Ma C, Chen T, Shaw C, Wang L

Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: Horse erythrocytes:10% Hemolysis=36.041 µM,Horse erythrocytes:50% Hemolysis=211.927 µM,Human keratinocytes HaCat:IC50=20.85 µM,Human microvascular endothelial cells HMEC-1:37% Cytotoxicity=100 µM
Sequence Information.Target Organism: Staphylococcus aureus NCTC 10788(MIC=1µM),Staphylococcus aureus NCTC 10788(MBC=2µM),Escherichia coli ATCC 8739(MIC=2µM),Escherichia coli ATCC 8739(MBC=4µM),Staphylococcus aureus NCTC 12493(MIC=2µM),Staphylococcus aureus NCTC 12493(MBC=2µM),Klebsiella pneumoniae ATCC 43816(MIC=8µM),Klebsiella pneumoniae ATCC 43816(MBC=8µM),Enterococcus faecium NTCC 12697(MIC=4µM),Enterococcus faecium NTCC 12697(MBC=8µM),Pseudomonas aeruginosa ATCC 9027(MIC=4µM),Pseudomonas aeruginosa ATCC 9027(MBC=8µM),Human lung adenocarcinoma NCI-H838(IC50=5.637µM),Human prostate adenocarcinoma PC-3(IC50=3.944µM),Human glioblastoma U251-MG(IC50=12.4µM),Human colon adenocarcinoma HCT 116(IC50=2.81µM),Human breast adenocarcinoma MCF-7(IC50=3.459µM)
